dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, "come what may!" And uh, saying the EU sees Britain wants a deal, but these rebels are making it "absolutely impossible."

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He added that the chances of a deal are rising because the EU can see that Britain wants a deal, adding that the bloc may be discouraged by rebel MPs' actions, accusing them of making further negotiations absolutely impossible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right! But then the emergency cabinet meeting? All about planning a snap election! With contingency plans to replace the rebels with loyalists!

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Johnson held an emergency cabinet meeting on Monday afternoon amid rumors the prime minister would call for a snap election. It follows reports that Johnson is gearing up to expel or block opposition Tory MPs from standing for election in the next election, if they support the opposition attempts to pass a law to block the U.K. from leaving the EU without a trade deal.
